  43 echo "  ai-maestro-restart   - Restart the server"
  44 echo "  ai-maestro-logs      - View logs"
  45 echo "  pm2 monit            - Monitor all PM2 processes"

 Do you want to create ai-maestro-start?
 ❯ 1. Yes
   2. Yes, allow all edits in bin/ during this session (shift+Tab)
   3. No
